betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Basic Capacitor Bank§r serves as an §6Energy Storage§r. It's capacity can §ereach up to 1MRf§r, but can be §aincreased§r by §econnecting more Capacitor Banks to combine it's energy storage§r. It's multiblock structure is §eshapeless§r so it can be in any shape, §eas long as it's beside each other§r.

To craft one, you'd need a §6Redstone Block§r, 4 §6Basic Capacitor§rs, and 4 §6Iron Ingot§rs.
